Hello Hagop,

 

Hope all is well and hope you enjoyed your leave!

 

I am sending this email to connect you with @Siju George <mailto:siju.george@etoilegroup.com>  who is the Head of Supply Chain from Etoile Group. We are looking to onboard them to our last mile team’s services and one topic they wanted to explore is insurance for their B2C orders.

 

Can we please set up a call when you are back to explore options?

 

 

Regards,

I am sending this email to connect you with @Siju George <mailto:siju.george@etoilegroup.com>  who is the Head of Supply Chain from Etoile Group. We are looking to onboard them to our last mile team’s services and one topic they wanted to explore is insurance for their B2C orders.

 

Can we please set up a call when you are back to explore options?
